korean: 오늘 회의에서 동료랑 의견이 안 맞아서 좀 언성이 높아졌다.
나는 A안이 맞다고 생각했는데 그 동료는 B안을 강하게 주장했다.
회의 끝나고 서로 미안하다고 하고 커피 한잔 했다. 다행히 감정은 안 남았다.
english: During today's meeting, a colleague and I disagreed and things got a bit heated.
I thought option A was right, but they were strongly pushing for option B.
In the end, our team leader stepped in and we found a compromise.
After the meeting, we both apologized and grabbed coffee together. Thankfully, there's no hard feelings.
